answers.answer: You should be seeing an ophthalmologist yearly with your health problems. Find one near you at www.aao.orgJCH MD

question: hi,  my question,  i had a minor stroke, if there is such a thing, also have type 2 diabetes, unknown until now, and high b.p.  controling both with med and diet now.   my eyesight at times, seems a little bit darker, focus a little off. have needed reading glass for a while now, but this is diffrent,  not blurry, just not focused,   seems little worse after meds,  know it needs checking, will,  just looking for what it might be .   thanks
title: little darker than before
